svmapp
Class gen_parameter

java.lang.Object
  svmapp.gen_parameter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class gen_parameter
extends Object
implements Serializable

This class stores all of the parameters required for data generation in a single location, as well as providing two public static int variables specifying the types of data dependencies which can be generated.

Author:
Navdeep Singh Daheley
See Also:
Serialized Form

          Multiplying coefficient of polynomial discriminant

 boolean loaded
          Identifies whether the training set was loaded or whether it was generated
 double[][] means
          Array of mean vectors
 double meanScale
          Mean scaling parameter; means are generated uniformly in [0,meanScale]
 double noise
          Noise parameter; variance of Gaussian noise to be added
 int nr_class
          Number of data classes
 double proximity
          Proximity parameter in [0,1] ; the minimum euclidean distance between generated mean vectors
 int size
          Training set size
static int UNIFORM
          Uniformly distributed, polynomially seperated data
 double[][][] vars
          Array of covariance matrices
 double varScale
          Variance scaling parameter in [0,1]; variances are generated in [0,meanScale*varScale]
